sites.name: Serengeti National Park
sites.description: Abundance of Big 5, especially the big cats, opportunities to view wildebeest migration aka migration safari.

sites.name: Okavango Delta
sites.description: A variety of tours such as canoe, boat, and classic safaris, waterway paradise, and presence of big 5

sites.name: Oldonyo Sapuk
sites.description: Embark on a private hiking tour to Oldonyo Sapuk from Nairobi. Discover the rich historical significance of this mountain and enjoy a thrilling adventure.
